title: Bloomberg Markets: Boal Says Mobile Impacting Supermarkets
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Boal Says Mobile Impacting Supermarkets
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Steven Boal Chief Executive Officer Quotient Discussing how Amazon.com buying Whole Foods Market impacts physical supermarkets in a growing digital age.
